## Design Philosophy Alignment

How does this feature align with Long-Home's core design pillars?

- [ ] Consequence over Conquest - Focuses on meaningful decisions
- [ ] Judgment Under Fatigue - Relates to player decision-making
- [ ] Organic Teaching - Teaches through environment, not UI
- [ ] Diegetic First - Information is earned and in-world
- [ ] Ethical Streaming - Respectful handling of content
- [ ] Silence as Tool - Uses quiet moments effectively
- [ ] Realistic Risk - Based on real mountaineering scenarios
